text: We had damage to our deck railing during a big wind storm. Deck Masters was able to remove the old railing and install a new, sturdier cable wire railing! We also had new stairs put in because the old ones were in an area that heaved too much in the winter. Extremely pleased with the craftsmanship of Sean, Robert and Jeff. They were fast, friendly and skilled. Would recommend Deck Masters to anyone looking for quality work.
author: Jackie Slagle
